senses: [{"definition":"A way or means of approaching or entering; an entrance; a passage.","example":null},{"definition":"The act of approaching or entering; an advance.","example":null},{"definition":"The right or ability of approaching or entering; admittance; admission; accessibility.","example":null},{"definition":"The quality of being easy to approach or enter.","example":null},{"definition":"Admission to sexual intercourse.","example":null},{"definition":"An increase by addition; accession","example":"an access of territory"},{"definition":"An onset, attack, or fit of disease; an ague fit.","example":null},{"definition":"An outburst of an emotion; a paroxysm; a fit of passion","example":null},{"definition":"The right of a noncustodial parent to visit their child.","example":null},{"definition":"The process of locating data in memory.","example":null},{"definition":"Connection to or communication with a computer program or to the Internet.","example":null}]
